issue.message: Class referenced in the manifest, `com.asforce.asforcetkf2.ui.ground.kotlin.TopraklamaActivity`, was not found in the project or the libraries
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE no longer provides write access when targeting Android 11+, even when using `requestLegacyExternalStorage`
Consider using `WebViewCompat.startSafeBrowsing` instead which will support more devices.

The Network Security Configuration allows the use of user certificates in the release version of your app

Permitting connections with SSL-related errors could allow eavesdroppers to intercept data sent by your app, which impacts the privacy of your users. Consider canceling the connections by invoking `SslErrorHandler#cancel()`.
